title: Elgar Cello Concerto
brief_description: Julian Lloyd Webber performs the Elgar Cello Concerto in E Minor Op. 85 and Romance Op. 62 on his Bartanksy Stradivarius (1684) cello. He is accompanied by the Royal Philharmonic Orchestra, conducted by Sir Yehudi Menuhin. The video includes a short introduction by Robert Walker.
